name: Thieves
storyline:
The village of Rhymney is being terrorized by a witch. The town sheriff has decided to send some of the local thieves from the village prison into the witch's lair in an attempt to put an end to her wicked ways once and for all.

In return for your service, you will be pardoned of your previous crimes. You will also be allowed to keep all the treasure you might find along the way.

Assuming you return to tell the tale, of course...
summary: Thieves is a 2D platformer for DOS created in 1997 by Duncan Gill. In Thieves, you play as one or two thieves tasked with hunting down and stopping a witch who is terrorizing the town.
